# Highland Farms Oregon

> Highland Farms is an all-inclusive farm and forest wedding venue located at 21261 East Little River Road, Brightwood, Oregon 97011 — 50 minutes from Portland and 20 minutes from Mt. Hood. The five-acre property features Scottish Highland Cows, old-growth forest, on-site lodging for up to 24 guests, a Nordic cedar soaking spa, and private farm tours. Primary contact: events@highlandfarms-oregon.com or +1 (831) 214-2053.

## About

Highland Farms is a transformed cedar mill property at the base of Mt. Hood, nestled in the forest valley of Brightwood, Oregon. The farm is home to Scottish Highland Cows, Icelandic Sheep, White Peacocks, Nigerian Dwarf Goats, Kunekune Pigs, geese, and chickens. The property includes a restored historic lodge, a cozy cottage, and a glamping camp — all surrounded by towering old-growth evergreens and accessed via a private road.

Highland Farms was featured on LivePDX, Portland's popular local guide, and has 18,000+ Instagram followers at @highlandfarmsor.

## Experiences

- [Highland Cow Farm Tours](https://highlandfarmsoregon.com/farm-tours): Private 60-minute farm tours for up to 6 guests. Meet Highland Cows, Icelandic Sheep, White Peacocks, Nigerian Dwarf Goats, and more. Book via Acuity Scheduling.
- [Nordic Forest Spa](https://highlandfarmsoregon.com/nordic-spa): Private 60-minute cedar soaking tub sessions for 6-8 guests, nestled among towering evergreens. Nordic-inspired forest bathing experience. Book via Acuity Scheduling.
- [Gift Certificates](https://highlandfarms.as.me/schedule/e759f21b): Give the gift of a Highland Farms experience.

## Accommodations

- [Stay Overview](https://highlandfarmsoregon.com/stay): Four unique accommodations nestled among towering evergreens. Book direct for the best rate.
- [The Lodge](https://highlandfarmsoregon.com/stay/lodge): Historic cedar mill lodge sleeping 8 guests across 4 bedrooms and 2 baths. Features a spacious family room, dining area, full kitchen, and outdoor forest deck.
- [The Cottage](https://highlandfarmsoregon.com/stay/cottage): Cozy retreat near The Lodge with 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, and full kitchen. Sleeps 8 guests. Perfect for families or a peaceful forest getaway.
- [The Camp](https://highlandfarmsoregon.com/stay/camp): Glamping experience with a restored Airstream trailer and canvas tent camping under towering evergreens. Sleeps 4 guests.
- [The Whole Farm](https://highlandfarmsoregon.com/stay/whole-farm): Reserve the entire property for up to 24 guests. Exclusive access to all accommodations, the farm, and the forest. Perfect for weddings, retreats, and large gatherings.
